Anaheim.Incredicoaster: Incredicoaster is a wood-mimicking steel roller coaster located in the Pixar Pier section of Disney California Adventure in Anaheim, California. Opened on February 8, 2001 as "California Screamin'", it was one of the park's original rides, and was the only roller coaster at the Disneyland Resort to feature an inversion. Its top speed of 55 miles per hour (89 km/h) makes it the fastest ride at the Disneyland Resort and one of the fastest rides at any Disney theme park.
